Headline: #8A South Halsted, #108 Halsted/95th Temporary Southbound Reroute near Lowe/127th
ShortDescription: Southbound 8A South Halsted, 108 Halsted/95th buses are temp. rerouted via Halsted, Vermont, Lowe, 127th and Halsted: due to, street blockage near Lowe/127th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard bound Red Line Service Delayed at Addison
ShortDescription: Howard bound Red Line trains are standing near Addison due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
